parts.text: {"word":"ahorrar","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"貯める、節約する、蓄える","english_definition":"to save (money, time, energy); to economize; to put aside for future use.","examples":[{"sentence":"Ahorro dinero para comprarme un coche nuevo.","translation":"新しい車を買うためにお金を貯めています。","english_translation":"I am saving money to buy a new car."},{"sentence":"Debemos ahorrar energía apagando las luces cuando salimos de una habitación.","translation":"部屋を出るときは電気を消してエネルギーを節約しなければなりません。","english_translation":"We must save energy by turning off the lights when we leave a room."},{"sentence":"Ahorra tiempo usando el transporte público.","translation":"公共交通機関を使って時間を節約しなさい。","english_translation":"Save time by using public transportation."}],"collocations":["ahorrar dinero (お金を貯める)","ahorrar tiempo (時間を節約する)","ahorrar energía (エネルギーを節約する)","ahorrar para el futuro (将来のために貯める)","ahorrar gastos (費用を節約する)"],"synonyms":["economizar","reservar","guardar","atesorar","acumular"],"antonyms":["gastar","derrochar","malgastar","despilfarrar"]}],"etymology":{"value":"Derived from the Arabic word 'ḥurr' (حرّ) meaning 'free'.
